stimulusHtml: A block of mass m is pulled by a rope along a horizontal surface with negligible friction. For time t > 0, the magnitude of the acceleration of the object as a function of time is given by the equation a = Ae-kt , where A and k are positive constants. Which of the following expressions determines the impulse exerted on the block by the rope during the time interval 0 < t < t1 ?
